title: Ticket #4080: job_dagman_global_event_log-A can't be run repeatedly
description: job_dagman_global_event_log-A can't be run repeatedly. It always writes to the same job log file, then reads that log file to determine when the job completes. As a result, after the first successful run, the jobs are considered to have exited immediately, causing other problems.
remarks:
2013-Nov-18 14:44:26 by adesmet:
Fixed. Unlinks the file in question before submitting.
